title: Justice Dept. investigates TikTok parent over potential data-gathering issues
description: At issue is whether ByteDance violated any laws by inappropriately gathering the data of some users, including journalists who cover tech firms.

title: What you should do about TikTok’s potential sale or ban
description: Maybe for real this time, the U.S. might force a sale (or potentially a ban) of TikTok in America. Here's what this means for you.

title: YouTube reinstates Donald Trump’s account
description: The video sharing service said it weighed the "continued risk of real-world violence" and Trump's entrance into the 2024 presidential election.
